title: Hub-spoke network topology (WIP)
shortDescription: Traditional regional network hub-spoke topology that acts as a central point of connectivity to many spoke virtual networks and can also be used as a connectivity point to your on-premises networks.

highlights.content: Secure egress and ingress traffic via Azure Firewall
Protect spoke traffic with Network Security Groups
Capture diagnostic logs in Azure Monitor
Secure access to spoke Virtual Machines by using Azure Bastion for connectivity
